analyzed: om namaḥ śrī mahāmañju nāthāya

original: kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā idam āha sthito 'grataḥ // Mns_6 //

original: māyājālābhisaṃbodhiṃ yathā lābhī bhavāmy aham // Mns_7 //

tat yathā bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃbuddhaḥ kāra sambhavaḥ
akāraḥ sarva varṇa agryaḥ mahā arthaḥ parama akṣaraḥ

mahā rūpaḥ mahā kāyaḥ mahā varṇaḥ mahā vapuḥ

mahā prajñaḥ mahā dhīmān mahā upāyaḥ mahā ākṛtiḥ

iti vajradhātu maṇḍala jñāna gāthāḥ caturdaśa
daśa pāramitā praptaḥ daśa pāramitā āśrayaḥ

viśva māyā dharaḥ rājā buddha vidyā dharaḥ mahān
vajra tīkṣnaḥ mahā khaḍgaḥ viśuddhaḥ parama akṣaraḥ
sarva bhāva svabhāva agryaḥ
eka kṣaṇa mahā prajñaḥ sarva dharma avabodha dhṛk
sarva dharma abhisamayaḥ bhūta anta muniḥ agra dhīḥ
stimitaḥ su prasanna ātmā samyaksaṃbuddha bodhi dhṛk
pratyakṣaḥ sarva buddhānām jñāna arciḥ su prabhāsvaraḥ
iti pratyavekṣaṇa jñāna gāthāḥ dvācatvāriṃśat
bāhu duṇḍa śata ākṣepaḥ pada nikṣepa narttanaḥ

brahmāṇḍa śikhara ākrānta pāda aṅguṣṭha nakhe sthitaḥ
eka arthaḥ dvaya dharma arthaḥ parama arthaḥ vinaśvaraḥ
nānā vijñapti rūpa arthaḥ citta vijñāna saṃtatiḥ
aśeṣa bhāva artha ratiḥ śūnyatā ratiḥ agra dhīḥ
bhava rāga ādi atītaḥ ca bhava traya mahā ratiḥ

sarva sattva mahā saṅgaḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ gagana upamaḥ
sarva sattva indriya artha jñaḥ sarva sattva manoharaḥ
sarva niryāṇa mārga sthaḥ sarva niryāṇa deśakaḥ
dvādaśa aṅga bhava utkhātaḥ dvādaśa ākāra śuddha dhṛk

viṃśati ākāra saṃbodhiḥ vibuddhaḥ sarva vid paraḥ
sarva kṣaṇa abhisamayaḥ sarva citta kṣaṇa artha vid
yāna tritaya niryātaḥ eka yāna phale sthithaḥ
ogha udadhi samuttīrṇaḥ yoga kāntāra niḥsṛtaḥ
kleśa upakleśa saṃkleśa su prahīṇa sa vāsanaḥ
sarva saṃjñā prahīṇa arthaḥ vijñāna arthaḥ nirodha kṛt
sarva sattva manaḥ viṣayaḥ sarva sattva manaḥ gatiḥ

siddhāntaḥ vibhrama apetaḥ sarva bhrānti vivarjitaḥ
eka kṣaṇa abhisaṃbuddhaḥ sarva buddha svabhāva dhṛk
iti sama tā jñāna tathāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ
sarva saṃbuddha boddhavyaḥ buddha bodhiḥ anuttaraḥ

nirmāṇa kāyaḥ kāyāngryaḥ buddha nirmāṇa vaṃśa dhṛk
uttīrṇa bhava kāntāraḥ ekaḥ śāstā jagadguruḥ

karuṇā varma varmitaḥ

original: sa sārddhaṃ krodharājānaiḥ provācoccair idaṃ vacaḥ // Mns_*2 //
analyzed: sa sārddham krodha rājānaiḥ provāca uccais idam vacaḥ
anumodāmahe nātha sādhu sādhu subhāṣitam
kṛtaḥ smākam mahān arthaḥ samyaksaṃbodhi prāpakaḥ
jagataḥ ca api ānāthasya vimukti phala kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
śreyaḥ mārgaḥ viśuddhaḥ yam māyā jāla naya uditaḥ

original: buddhānāṃ viṣayo hy eṣa samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitaḥ // Mns_*5 //
analyzed: buddhānām viṣayaḥ hi eṣa samyaksaṃbuddha bhāṣitaḥ
iti upasaṃhāra gāthāḥ pañca

original: ārthamāyājālaṣoḍaśasāhāsrikān mahāyogatantrāntaḥ pātisamādhijālapaṭalād bhagavatā śrīśākyamuninā bhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasyādvayaparamārtha  #
analyzed: ārtha māyā jāla ṣoḍaśa sāhāsrikāt mahā yogatantra antar pāti samādhi jāla paṭalāt bhagavatā śrī śākyamuninā bhāṣitā bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñāna sattvasya advaya parama artha
nāma saṃgītiḥ parisamāptā
paṇḍita ratnakāji vajra ācāryasya bauddha stotra saṃgraha uddhṛta
saṃgraha kartā sampādakaḥ ca janārdanaśāstrī pāṇḍeyaḥ
ī siṅ likhyata
jayakarta
yavadvīpa sam
